metadata.instructions: Claude: enumerate distinct meanings for each word, and fill the 'meanings' array below with entries conforming to the schema in CLAUDE.md and config.json (meaning_entry).

meanings.MonolingualDef: Preposición que indica posición física encima o por encima de algo
meanings.ExampleSentence: Los mensajes están sobre la mesa
meanings.prompt: A woman of 50 with short black hair, writing on a little notepad next to the kettle in the corner of the kitchen

meanings.MonolingualDef: Preposición que indica el tema o asunto de conversación
meanings.ExampleSentence: Los amigos hablan sobre el fútbol
meanings.prompt: An english pub, a group of friends with pints talking and watching football

meanings.MonolingualDef: Preposición que indica tiempo o cantidad aproximada
meanings.prompt: A boy with a small red car in an english town on the phone to his friends

meanings.MonolingualDef: Adjetivo que indica identidad o igualdad entre personas o cosas
meanings.ExampleSentence: Los gemelos llevan el mismo suéter
meanings.prompt: Two blond twins with blue eyes, wearing red jumpers and black trousers sitting together in school

meanings.MonolingualDef: Pronombre que enfatiza la acción personal del sujeto
meanings.prompt: Thanos sitting on a dark rock in space with the infinity gauntlet
